projects.name: Fossil Hunters
projects.description: Build your own dinosaurs and explore secret caves in the center of the Earth as you uncover forgotten fossils and lost treasure.
projects.purpose: Our first priority is completing Fossil Hunters and giving our players the best quality fossil-hunting experience possible. Our original budget accounts for the initial PC and Mac release, with distribution on Steam and Uplay.

rewards.name: Fossil Friend
rewards.description: Get a digital copy of the game.

rewards.name: Fossil Enthusiast
rewards.description: Get a download key for the soundtrack!

rewards.name: Fossil Hunter
rewards.description: Get the soundtrack and the art book with a $5 savings

projects.name: 2017 HONK! Festival of Activist Street Bands
projects.description: The HONK! Festival is a one-of-a-kind street spectacle of revolutionary proportions. This year marks the 12th anniversary.
projects.purpose: We need to raise $15,000 to insure that every band that wants to come to HONK! can make the journey. Every donation — your donation — will help.

rewards.name: $12 for 12 Years
rewards.description: Keep your eyes peeled for a personalized Social Media shout out!

rewards.name: Two Music Tracks
rewards.description: Recieve a digital download of 2 songs from one of our fabulous HONK! bands.

rewards.name: 2017 Poster plus 2017 T-Shirt
rewards.description: Poster to decorate your wall and matching 2017 HONK! t-shirt.

projects.name: 24 Hour Flowers - Relaunch!
projects.description: An interactive folding pop-up book exploring a diverse array of flowers that bloom for only one day.
projects.purpose: 24 Hour Flowers: inside of an old, rusty clock thrive 8 species of flowers that all have one thing in common: their blooms only last for one day! Prepare for a journey full of new botanical knowledge and breathtaking illustrations. As you explore four families of fascinating yet fleeting flora growing thick through the clock gears of this 12-sided book, you will learn new facts about each one, what makes them the same, and what makes them different.

rewards.name: Original Doodle
rewards.description: Hand written thank you card and an original doodle from one of the artists.

rewards.name: 1 Book
rewards.description: Signed copy of 24 Hour Flowers and a hand written thank you card.
